website_summaries.verdict: Calming herbs are key ingredients in this hemp-based anti-anxiety chew.
pros: Hemp oil-based chews with calming herbs like chamomile and valerian root
Very effective for separation anxiety as well as noise-induced anxiety
cons: Not all dogs like the taste
Use caution when giving to smaller dogs
half a chew may be adequate

customer_reviews.title: Buy These! Best on the market
customer_reviews.text: These are a great value! I've bought many of these calming supplements for my dogs and these seem to work the best. I give them to my 90 lb Lab for separation anxiety and to my 9 lb Chiweenie when we cut her nails. These will last me quite a while!
customer_reviews.author: Winnie

customer_reviews.title: Better than CBD oil
customer_reviews.text: Was previosuly giving my pup CBD oil for severe anxiety. These chews are way easier to give and are just as effective!
customer_reviews.author: joseph r. saffa

customer_reviews.title: Pita Thanks You!
customer_reviews.text: Pita turned 16 this year and was always a little nervous with thunderstorms, vacuum cleaners, etc. I attributed it to her previous life before we adopted her out of a shelter, but things just seemed to be dramatically worse this year as _everything_ made her scared. Tried other calming medications, including a prescription from my vet. Nothing worked. Further, she is very spoiled and won't eat just anything (not sure how she got that way ;) Anyway, got these calming treats with hemp oil and Pita is back to her confident self! They must taste pretty good, because she eats them with her regular food. Can't say enough good things about these treats. Thanks Steve and Gracie!
customer_reviews.author: vaaesthete

customer_reviews.title: Helps my dogs with anxiety
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these chews for my rescues Stella and Josie. I am a big fan of the brand, my rescues all wear Pawsitive collars. 😊 I was excited to hear about these as I have been considering trying calming aids for a while. So far I have not been disappointed, Stella is more calm and less prone to anxiety. Josie already has a lot of anxiety and these really helped her be able to chill out and not be so nervous all the time. I will be giving these to her daily with her food. Love the company and the mission! It feels good knowing everything I buy from pawsitive also goes to dogs in need. :)
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Play with the dose to find what works best - but I’ve all works great!
customer_reviews.text: The recommended dose is not helpful - too litter for my hyper active shepherd mix. I suggest you use the recommended dose as a guide line to start, but than find out what dose works best for you and your pup! Otherwise, my pup loves the taste and they do help relax him. I gave one to my moms poodle, who suffers from horrible anxiety, and within 45 mins her quality of life was greatly improved. It was like a difference between night and day. I definitely will be ordering this product again! it’s a bit pricy but it works! And I would happily recommend this to anyone who has an anxious or hyper active pup! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna W.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps 2 female puppy Pitt mix  females calm & relaxed
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 dogs. The oldest one is always calm. But, we have 2 Pitt mix females. 1 just over almost 2 and one 6 months. Both female and aggressive towards each other and puppy eating everything. These calming treats are amazing and really work. They enjoy the taste. We give them at bedtime. We have not had fights or damage during the evening. We will keep buying than. They are worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Doug G

customer_reviews.title: Dogs did not like them
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 dogs of different breeds and none of them would eat them. What use is having a good product if the dogs don't like it. I'm surprised some reviews state their dogs like the taste, but I noticed a not so pleasant smell from the container. If your dogs are picky I would not recommend these treats.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I WAS DEFINITELY SKEPTICAL AS I HAVE NEVER USED ANYTHING LIKE THIS BEFORE, BUT IM SO HAPPY WITH HOW WELL THEY WORK. I HAVE AN 11 YEAR OLD PITTIE THAT IS TERRIFIED DURING STORMS, HER ANXIETY LEVEL CAUSES HER TO SHAKE AND PANT UNCONTROLLABLY. I HAVE A THUNDER JACKET THAT HELPS BUT DOESN'T STOP THE ANXIETY BY ITSELF. NOW WITH THESE TREATS AND HER JACKET SHE LAYS PEACEFULLY DURING STORMS WITH NOT A CARE IN THE WORLD! IM SO HAPPY I CAME ACROSS THESE TREATS AND I LOVE THAT THEY GIVE BACK TO THE SHELTERS.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Kapinos

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!!
customer_reviews.text: I started using this product for my 8 month puppy. She is a baby and has separation anxiety, she is also a lab mix who loves to chew. She has chewed shoes , a hole in my couch and crating her is impossible she is an escape artist. This product has calmed her down and she loves the flavor. Customer service is great, quick ship and a follow up after the product arrives. And they believe in giving back to shelters. Hometown valves exactly what I look for. I have already recommended this product and company. Thank you will be ordering again soon!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Marks

customer_reviews.title: Great Product to help with separation anxiety
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my dog Bella, after her brother passed away last month. These chews have made a noticeable difference in just a few days as she was having separation anxiety but with the chews she seems to be more calm each day. I'm very happy with them so far.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work
customer_reviews.text: This product seems to help my foster doggie when crated and left alone. Also since I have been craving trinity I also crated my other two who aren’t. Use to it anymore to help trinity. My girl Lexi was freaking out being back in the crate. It was so bad she was cutting her nose on the door trying to get out. I always give them chews but that didn’t matter. These pills seemed to have helped her. I haven’t tried them yet for a thunderstorm but so far so good. I also love that the company will make a donation from each sale to a rescue group. I am all for helping animals esp rescues.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Calming Chews are a Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: I love this product for my Muggin. He suffers from extreme anxiety and separation anxiety as well as being very rambunctious to the point of being disobedient at times. We have tried several calming products as well as thunder jackets over several years and nothing has worked until now! This is the best product. Within a week we instantly had a calmer dog. When we have run out and didn’t think it would make a big difference if he didn’t stay on them our dog went right back to his previous behavior. This product is a lifesaver!
customer_reviews.author: No Nonsense

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: We are working on the right dose, but once we have it, I'm sure this will be a 5 star product! Cassie has separation anxiety and lately that was manifesting in destructive counter surfing. We were at our wits end, so turned to calming pills. I found this one and it had good reviews, so here we are! Cassie is much more mellow and calm while on these. So far, these seem like a miracle!
customer_reviews.author: Mavis

customer_reviews.title: They keep him calm and not chewing
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves getting his calming treats every morning before I go to work! I give them about 30 minutes before I leave so they can settle in. He is boarder line between 2-3 chews so I tried two first but three definitely works better!
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: Helps a tiny bit
customer_reviews.text: I dog sit for other people so I was hoping to find a product to calm down my one dog who gets too excited when a dog comes to stay. She does seem to be a tiny bit better but it wears off quickly and she starts jumping around. She has gone through extensive obedience training and she knows how to behave. She simply gets overstimulated, even though my other 2 dogs are being obedient and staying calm.
customer_reviews.author: D. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived on time and in great condition. Directions were clear and easy to follow. And it works! Annie, our Heeler, was having anxiety brought on by old age and a new puppy in the house. So by giving her 1 cube it calms her considerably. 2 cubes and she is a bit too calm. Really like this product! And the Pawsitive people are very involved and active in paying it forward! Great company. Good people. What's not to like?
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: Great for big puppies
customer_reviews.text: Our pup is a six month old, 70Lb German Shepherd who is constantly into stuff, chewing ANYTHING and wants to non-stop play. By the end of the day, he needs to calm down and we need a break. These help immensely. He doesn't get lethargic or anything like that. He just does everything he normally does only to a lesser degree. He loves them, too.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly K. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Helpul for anxiety and traveling-plus great customerservice
customer_reviews.text: While my older dog is always a bit suspicious of the taste, my younger puppy (who whines w/ separation anxiety) seems to like them fine. Both dogs' thunderstorm anxiety greatly helped by the treats -- also both sleep soudly now when I use the treats before long trips. Was impressed by To the Rescue's customer service as well, they really care about helping your dogs-and donate to animal charity.
customer_reviews.author: GwP

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about these
customer_reviews.text: I received this product for free if I would review. So here it is: My dogs LOVE these. How ever I do not notice ANY difference in their behavior. I have one very nervous dog who I actually even tried 2 treats instead of one and still nothing. My other dogs are not nervous but we tried during thunderstorms when they do get a little upset and again nothing. We have tried in several different situations but still they don't seem to do any thing. I was disappointed that these didn't even take the edge off for them. Hopefully they work for someone else pups!
customer_reviews.author: P. Horne

customer_reviews.title: It worked for my ACD!
customer_reviews.text: we adopted an 8 month old ACD/Hound mix a week ago not knowing that a young ACD (Australian Cattle Dog) is basically like adopting a T-Rex. Oh I love him to bit, but he's an aggressive chewer and has energy for days. He also has some separation anxiety. I gave him two chews today (the recommended dose) He's still got some energy, but he is far more mellow, and can settle down. A perfect balance. This is my first day using it, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: DianettaTop Contributor: Violins

customer_reviews.title: These treats rock!!!!
customer_reviews.text: All four of my dogs, three being seniors, are totally relaxed and asleep after their first try with your wonderful treats. I am super impressed with your product and that you donate to shelters as I’m a dog trainer and rescue advocate.
customer_reviews.author: Therese'

customer_reviews.title: Works Wonders for my Dog With Anxiety!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. I have given my dog several different brands of anxiety treats and none of them have ever worked. These treats have done wonders especially during thunderstorms. I did have a little trouble with the dosing based on weight, however after a few times of changing the amounts, we were able to get just the right amount. The treats take about 45 minutes to work, but once it starts working, she's relaxed and calm. Thank you for an awesome product, I will definitely be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: CathyS

customer_reviews.title: Hemp without the melatonin
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased some hemp treats that had melatonin and while they worked, they made my dog sleepy. These allow her to relax without the drowsiness. I am able to use these during the day to help relieve her anxiety. She seems to really like the flavor and I like that she's not pacing frantically. It's a win for us both.
customer_reviews.author: OxO

customer_reviews.title: My hyper terrier mixed ....
customer_reviews.text: I have 20 lbs terrier mixed, and she is very hyper - she likes the treat, but I don't see any sign of her being calmer after getting the treat. It does not seem to work. I guess the search continue. *******Update******** Although the product is not quite working for my dog, which is a terrier mixed, it seems to be working for my friend's dog Chihuahua about 10 lbs. I also have to say the customer service is really good, and the the seller truly cares about your dog, so I really appreciate it.
customer_reviews.author: Yessie Susanto

customer_reviews.title: Husky Sky likes them.
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this for a nervous pup/doggo. My Husky is a nervous gal, and she would always freak out when she was at home alone. These treats are a life saver. She is super calm and relaxed when I come home. Definitely give them a try. She is currently 8 months old and is currently not spayed. She will be spayed in May 2019, just saying. I hope this info helps.
customer_reviews.author: Ana B.

customer_reviews.title: Happiness in a dog treat!
customer_reviews.text: I have been happily using Rescue Remedy for years for my anxious pups, but thought it would be great to find something similar in a solid form... Then I found these little miracle goodies! I gave both my dogs the suggested dosages (by weight), and within moments, they were both perfectly chill-- not weirded out, not spaced out, just even. The effect got us through the night. This has become my go-to product!
customer_reviews.author: linrox

customer_reviews.title: Dog tension relief
customer_reviews.text: Just started our Old English Bulldog on these. Made in USA, good product support from manufacturer. Only more time will tell if the treats are working well, he has a very sensitive stomach so we are gradually introducing them into his daily treat regiment. Flavor is good, he chews up right away. Best thing so far has been the follow up by their customer support department.
customer_reviews.author: Charles R Hines

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these. They seem to have helped him with his anxiety. (He's a german shepherd mixed with a little dutch shepherd.) He seems happier since we've given him these treats. I've been giving him 4 per day. I wonder if maybe the effect doesn't last all day though. By evening time he starts exhibiting anxious behavior again. And it'd just be too expensive to try and give him 4 extra treats at night for a total of 8 per day. Plus, I don't know if it's safe to give that amount. But he does look forward to getting them each morning.
customer_reviews.author: nbean

customer_reviews.title: Lacks needed information
customer_reviews.text: The bottle doesn't contain enough information for me to be comfortable administering the treats. It does not say how often they can be given. My nervous dog found them unappetizing- I had to dip them in peanut butter before she would eat them. It's not 100% clear whether or not they are helping, as I'm also using a thunder shirt.
customer_reviews.author: marylynn61

customer_reviews.title: Great chews from great company
customer_reviews.text: This is my second batch of chews from totherescue/ Gracie to the rescue and I highly recommend them! I first tried the hip and joint chews which my dogs were crazy about. I wanted to try their calming chews as there are times my dogs show a bit of anxiety and it really seems to help them! This company will gift chews to shelters for every purchase you make, same with their collars that are our go to daily collars.
customer_reviews.author: sigaxelandrogue

customer_reviews.title: No change at all
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my young German Sheperd who gets a little nutty when people are at the house- he is well exercised so I thought these would be good to help calm down his over excitement- I gave the recommended dose and really, nothing happened- I waited 4 hours gave again and no change- junk.
customer_reviews.author: Pippen

customer_reviews.title: Definitely helps some
customer_reviews.text: Had a hard time getting my puppy to eat these at first so I crushed them (soft chew) into some canned dog food. Now he eats them with no problem. They don’t knock him out but they definitely chill him out some. He has terrible separation anxiety. He still has it with these but it seems better. I will keep using them..
customer_reviews.author: Sarlamaples

customer_reviews.title: An amazing treat from an amazing company!
customer_reviews.text: My girl adores these treats! They work great. But unfortunately she was recently diagnosed with early stage kidney disease and I reached out to them to inquire about some nutrional information because she now has to follow a very specific diet. They not only responded super quickly (she can have them!) but sent a special gift for her too. I love this company and we love these treats!
customer_reviews.author: Taryn

customer_reviews.title: Works somewhat but it takes more than the recommended dose!
customer_reviews.text: There is no active ingredient that will calm your dogs in this treat! I have given two of our dogs the recommended dose, neither one of them had any reaction whatsoever. DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY! Edit: Gave our 37# dog four of the treats, (twice the recommended dose), that seems to have calmed him down during a storm we were having.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Smith

customer_reviews.title: My puppy calm pills
customer_reviews.text: I really thank you who ever made this amazing calm pill treat for dog. I give some to my mini Schnauzer before she get groom that way she stay calm. and the groomer said she was very good and saty calm. i will order some moore putty soon befor i ran out.thanks again for fast shipment good price and good product,Please don't change the formula
customer_reviews.author: MIMI

customer_reviews.title: one treat, ended stress cough
customer_reviews.text: my dog Rainbow who was rescued from pureto rico, suffers anxiety easily. have tried cbd oil with some control,but have to keep giving for a few days. when this arrived and she started her honking nervous cough. one treat did the trick. plus she must like them to take it easily. thank goodness i have a solution for her. thank u for this product
customer_reviews.author: doglover3

customer_reviews.title: No More Crying!
customer_reviews.text: My dog Sonic has had horrible anxiety since one of his brothers passed this past June. When he sees us leave he flips out. After receiving the product I've given him 2 nuggets about 30 min before we leave and he is much calmer and isn't crying and carrying on. A great product for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Raspberryjunkie

customer_reviews.title: Dogs Gobbled Them Up
customer_reviews.text: Our pups LOVE these! Calmed our terriers down and keeps our chi happy and content. 1 chew for each a day!
customer_reviews.author: kathleen kane

customer_reviews.title: Makes my crazies calm
customer_reviews.text: I have two pitbulls— one who likes to bark a shrill, random bark at absolutely nothing, throughout most of the day. The other has separation anxiety. I know how to pick em. (Just kidding, they’re perfect... albeit high maintenance... dogs) Anywho, this stuff takes their crazy and tooooones it down. Not to “Slater” in Dazed and Confused level.... more like Tom Petty, happy and loving the wildflowers level.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: These chews work great with my rescue dog. He was a feral street dog and very high strung. I started using these and you can see a considerable improvement in his behavior. He likes the flavor. I would recommend anyone who has a dog with anxiety to give these chews a try.
customer_reviews.author: mike cahall

customer_reviews.title: These chews are good!
customer_reviews.text: I noticed a difference in my dog a good hour or so after the first soft chew, She was calmer and was not bouncing off the walls like normal. It has not mellowed her to the point that I had hoped, but it would likely take an elephant tranquiliser to that! She has a ton of energy!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Blattner

customer_reviews.title: They are amazing
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a Dalmatian Pitbull and he was abused horribly by his previous owner. Which led him to having many issues such as seperation aniexty, nervousness, high pitched yelping and many others. This helps ease all of his hyperactivity from the aniexties and it helps him relax and be a normal dog. It helps him leave that past behind and enjoy his new life. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t help
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, my dog won’t even eat it unless I wrap it in cheese or something else tasty. When I do finally get her to eat it - it doesn’t seem to help her at all. I’ve given it to her for a week now when she has anxiety and it hasn’t made an difference. I even tried giving her slightly more than the dosage it recommends (says 1 chew for a dog 25pounds or under, so I tried giving her 1 and a half - nothing)
customer_reviews.author: Annika Emilie

customer_reviews.title: It might be good
customer_reviews.text: Hard to know how effective this is. It's easy to use - add to food at mealtime. The issue for my dog is fireworks. Here they go on for a long time, and at some noise level, nothing - including prescription drugs - helps. Her return to happy after New Years has been a bit quicker than in previous years. Maybe due to these chews.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Senior dog
customer_reviews.text: My senior dog tends to become agitated at night. She will go up and down the stairs several times, whine, etc. To The Rescue has helped immensely. It takes about 10-15 minutes for her to calm down from the moment I give her the chew. Then, she will sleep all night.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I had tried several calming aids for my newly acquired anxious, impulsive barker, 14 year old dog. So pleased with To The Rescue which I have given her daily for a month. She is calmer, seems to be more spry and handled the holiday company with dignity and ease! And that my purchase helps dog shelters is a great bonus! Recommend highly
customer_reviews.author: Marcia519

customer_reviews.title: Worked Well for My Three Dogs
customer_reviews.text: These work well to calm my dogs down. We moved from NC to TX (US) which is about 1300 miles over a three day period with the dogs in the car and stayed at two different hotels. Then we had to board them for 5 days and then they get to a totally new home. Needless to say they were anxious. These chews really helped to calm them so they could relax a bit in this stressful situation. I feel good about giving these to my fur babies.
customer_reviews.author: bblackw552

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: Our sweet 8 yo Boston Terrier Henry has extreme anxiety when the weather starts acting up. Any time I know there is a storm coming we give Henry Carter at least three treats and it seems to help him remain calm and not pant and shiver. I will purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Julia R

customer_reviews.title: Dog hates taste... No difference noticed
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 dogs, one eats this just fine and the other won't touch it... And we really bought these for him. We've managed to get him to eat then a few times but trickery, and there was no difference in his anxiety. Seems like a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia C.

customer_reviews.title: Helped just when I needed it
customer_reviews.text: We are "borrowing" our daughter's rescue dog while she makes some life changes. Mira came to us anxious, chased our cats, and seemed to need 24/7 watchfulness. I looked for a product that wouldn't drug her but leave her alert and able to follow commands. This did what we needed it to!
customer_reviews.author: Susan C.

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: Our dog was at bit hesitant with the smell/flavor but did eat and is usually good taking them now. They seem to work well with no undesirable side affects.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: To The Rescue - Dog Anxiety Relief
customer_reviews.text: Appears to settle my 6-mo-old puppy and 2-yr-old dog. The puppy eats them like treats. The older one won't take them unless I wrap them in cheese - no surprise - he won't take any chewable medication - I have to disguise them all.
customer_reviews.author: avid shopper

customer_reviews.title: Dogs dont like taste
customer_reviews.text: The treats seem to be working somewhat for my anxious Male bull terrier...but...I have to hide them in wet dog food.He and my female bull terrier both didn't want to eat the chews when offered on my hand.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer01

customer_reviews.title: No real change - price hike ridiculous
customer_reviews.text: We have a skittish rescue pup & wanted to help her anxiety. These did nothing for her and the price has gone up so much since we started buying. Not worth the cost for us.
customer_reviews.author: Applegurl77

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for us
customer_reviews.text: We got these for our puppy as he has separation anxiety. I do not notice a difference when we give him these, if anything I think he becomes more hyper and agitated. Perhaps it’s a puppy thing? But even when giving a higher dose I didn’t quite notice a strong enough difference to use again.
customer_reviews.author: Nicci Moscuzza

customer_reviews.title: These Treats Re The Best!
customer_reviews.text: I am a breeder so occasionally I need a calming treat for my puppies, adults. I have tried several brands. These are the best! They work quickly and they love the taste! PLUS part of the cost is donated to shelters, great idea!
customer_reviews.author: A Bell

customer_reviews.title: Worked Ok
customer_reviews.text: My dog has severe separation anxiety and i really thought these were going to work better. He is a 90 pound mastiff mix and i was giving him 6-10 a day and it did not seem to soothe him at all. The only thing i noticed is he stopped peeing in his kennel. Otherwise i was hoping it would help his panting and chewing on his kennel when we were gone. Maybe it would work better for a less severe case or in thunderstorms etc. Just my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Made my dog sick
customer_reviews.text: Don’t get these people. It literally effects my dog so bad. I’ve used similar treats to these and they work just fine. But these are making him sick everytime. Not throwing up sick. Like not moving the entire day dry nose sick... be aware! Just want to give heads up. Literally throwing the rest of mine away right now.... better brand- search calming bites. Cost a little more but work and don’t make your dog sick
customer_reviews.author: patrick

customer_reviews.title: Calms my Corgi puppy down
customer_reviews.text: Calms my 10 month old corgi down a bit when we have to leave for work. She sometimes will just go take a nap, other times she is just more content chewing on a bully stick by herself. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jamie H.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work for Cowboy
customer_reviews.text: This product didn't help my rescue, Cowboy, to comfortably travel in the car. Because it has worked with so many others in different circumstances, I thought it was worth a try. I was pleasantly surprised when the president of the company reached out to me, cheerfully offered a refund, and provided helpful suggestions about where to next. This company backs its products 100%, so try them.
customer_reviews.author: Doug M.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: These treats are the worst they actually made my dog hyperactive. As soon as I stopped she started calming down I would never buy again
customer_reviews.author: Rachel L.

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: We have a blue healer that has huge anxiety issues when left alone for more than an hour. Always broke out of the kennel and destroyed the house. We give him 3-4 of these calming treats before we leave each time and he hasn’t broken out of his kennel since
customer_reviews.author: Ts

customer_reviews.title: We love these!
customer_reviews.text: Only been using these chews for a few days now, but so far, so great! My pups love the taste and seem to have taken the edge off my hyperactive dog. Excited to continue using these!
customer_reviews.author: kaydia

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I was using a different brand of the same product until i noticed this brand has the same ingredients but double. I give him less chews then the other brand for the same effect. My pup is home alone sometimes and these really help. I’ve seen a difference for sure!!
customer_reviews.author: Cocobv

customer_reviews.title: Valerian smells bad, repels dog.
customer_reviews.text: If you're going to make a product for calming dogs at least make it tempting to eat for the dog to eat. My dog will eat almost anything but spat these out repeatedly, even when smeared with peanut butter. How do I get a refund?
customer_reviews.author: Billwillie

customer_reviews.title: Great treats
customer_reviews.text: These were great treats for our two dogs. We have a pit and a chow mix and both tend to get a bit overwhelmed. These treats help them settle when we have guests over or fireworks are happening outside.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Separation anxiety help
customer_reviews.text: We got these for our new rescue dog who has separation anxiety. These have helped so much. They made such a difference that I stopped using them after a couple months thinking we had trained her well enough it would be fine. Within a day all her anxiety behaviors returned and she destroyed her kennel. We won't be caught without these again.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Not quite enough for my dog with anxiety
customer_reviews.text: These work a little, but not enough. She doesn't really seem to like the taste and they bothered her stomach. My other dog loves them, but doesn't really need the calming aspect.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy DeMartelaere

customer_reviews.title: Yummy treat I guess
customer_reviews.text: Worked as a treat for my dog, but didn't seem to help calm her
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: IT REALLY WORKS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! My dog has extreme anxiety and pants, cries and excessively licks his paws. I gave him a chew and within 15 minutes he was completely calm! I will definitely buy more of these!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine A. Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Dog wouldn’t even put it in his mouth.
customer_reviews.text: Our dog wouldn’t even put it in his mouth. The cat tried to bury it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think this calmed my dog’s anxiety at all. Now they’re just snacks.
customer_reviews.author: quinncm

customer_reviews.title: Like having a new dog
customer_reviews.text: My dog has anxiety issues. We recently moved and she was so upset that she was refusing to go outside, hiding under my bed and not eating. Within days of starting the calming treats she was back outside running around and playing with the other dogs. She does not hide under my bed anymore. It is like she is a different dog!
customer_reviews.author: DeAnna

customer_reviews.title: They seem to work!
customer_reviews.text: They work efficiently when I can get my rescue pup to eat them. He has IBS and lots of anxiety as well as dietary issues.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: They seem to be helping my dog's anxiety and they are a good price.
customer_reviews.author: sharon sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed ☹️
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted my fur babies to ❤️ this product. I love that the company gives back to shelters. However they just won’t eat them. The smell is really strong and unpleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Melisa

customer_reviews.title: Chillin' Chihuahua
customer_reviews.text: My pup is a ball of anxiety all of the time. Just started these. She loves them and I think they are helping.
customer_reviews.author: Fly on the Wall

customer_reviews.title: Good anxiety treats
customer_reviews.text: My Benny has a lot of anxiety. These seem to help and he thinks they are yummy. So it’s a win win.
customer_reviews.author: KKB

customer_reviews.title: No difference
customer_reviews.text: Sent back, no difference in behavior. Nothing helps a hyper pup.
customer_reviews.author: Weasel

customer_reviews.title: really calms my dog down.
customer_reviews.text: I have several show dogs that get nervous at shows around all the commotion. I gave 2 before leaving the house and then 2 more about an hour before we had to show. My dog showed great! They really work.
customer_reviews.author: ICUTTOO

customer_reviews.title: These work!!!
customer_reviews.text: The best calming treats ever. I have a very Hyper pup. Within minutes he is chill & he still had his personality.
customer_reviews.author: Jax B

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: These didn’t affect my 8 year old anxious chocolate lab at all. I even tried giving him above the recommended dose.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Relief
customer_reviews.text: These work great for helping keep my dog calm during storms.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and it works
customer_reviews.text: This product worked wonders for my 4 year pitbull/boxer mix. I dont give them daily but when we have company or before going on the trails, she is alot more chill and calms her alot ! She will not eat them plain I have to hide them in her wet food
customer_reviews.author: marah

customer_reviews.title: Good Treats, No Behavior Change
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t see any change in my dog’s behavior, but he really liked them as treats.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua M Klun

customer_reviews.title: Oposite Effect
customer_reviews.text: My GSP puppy (almost 1 year old) was not a huge fan of these. He needed some encouragement to eat them. When giving them to him in the evening he almost seemed MORE unsettled and hard to calm down, maybe he just has oposite reactions. Tried it twice with similar effects.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Results right away
customer_reviews.text: My puppy gets really bad anxiety before I leave anywhere and these have definitely helped in reducing his destructive behavior to practically none. There is the occasional shredded roll of paper towels he always manages to find though.
customer_reviews.author: Jovan

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Very good product to help my dog with travel anxiety
customer_reviews.author: JULIE A.

customer_reviews.title: Just a dog treat did absolutely nothing.
customer_reviews.text: Did nothing for my dog nothing but expensive dog treats.
customer_reviews.author: David Cravotta

customer_reviews.title: Tasty treat
customer_reviews.text: My dog enjoyed these tasty treats! He has some major separation anxiety so I’m not sure if they fully helped with it (obviously I’m not home when he has his anxiety) but he loved the flavor and I hope they helped calm him!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Calming chews not successful
customer_reviews.text: I received this yesterday just prior to an approaching storm, so I immediately gave a couple to my dog that is very scared of storms. Unfortunately, she was the most terrified I have ever seen her previously. It was a very rough remainder of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Humf
customer_reviews.text: Dogs think they’re yummy but haven’t seen improvement in hyperactivity
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Eh.
customer_reviews.text: It calms down our husky so that she stops picking on her older brother. It doesn't work as a calming aid for him but it works for her.
customer_reviews.author: Tara C.

customer_reviews.title: Has tobe takeken daily but effective sorry for the miss spelled words
customer_reviews.text: Helps my dog alot she is very diehard to deal with and dont gwt along with other dogs well sorry my phone won't let mw correct want i want to say by the favt she hard to deal with but i love her and these calming chews help.alot
customer_reviews.author: usti W

customer_reviews.title: Seemed to help my older dog adjust to the new puppy
customer_reviews.text: It took a few days, but my older border collie/heeler mix did seem to calm down and adjust to the new puppy. The customer service has been really good! I was concerned if I was giving him enough/too much and Steve was very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: mdadams1212

customer_reviews.title: Calming effect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect if used ahead of time. Calming effect. Not sure dog likes flavor needy to disguise in something else
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Price!!
customer_reviews.text: Price was better, compared to my local store. They work well, but my dog is not crazy about the duck flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Not very helpful
customer_reviews.text: I did not find that these had much of a calming effect on my dog if any.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Inserra

customer_reviews.title: Shadow and Corona love these
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these and definitely helps with their anxiety. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Working great but it’s early
customer_reviews.text: My fur babies seem to be a little more calm when they have these on board. My picky eater has to be fooled with peanut butter on the outside to even give it a second thought. It seems to be helping but it’s too early to really tell.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee S

product_meta.title: Gracie To The Rescue Calming Treats for Dogs | 120 Soft Chews Dogs -Treats for Anxiety Relief, Separation, Motion Sickness, Hyperactive Behavior, Composure Aid, Thunder Storms, Chewing & Barking
feature_bullets: ✅ NATURALLY DELICIOUS DOG CALMING AID – To The Rescue calming treats offer anxiety relief for dogs using the Finest Natural Ingredients. Including, Chamomile, Organic Passion Flower, Valerian Root, L-Tryptophan and Organic Ginger Root. These soft chews were formulated by a veterinarian to help with calming dogs anxiety and relaxing your furry family member. Our veterinarian formulated chews are designed to deliver pet anxiety relief and deliciousness!

✅ HELPS WITH HYPERACTIVE & AGGRESSIVE BEHAVIOR – Our daily anti-anxiety chews were formulated by a veterinarian to help dogs with aggressive, overly active, and easily agitated tendencies. Our natural ingredients work in harmony to help your pet relieve stress and tension. Untreated anxiety in your dog can cause excessive jumping, biting, barking and general unease in your pet.

✅ CALMS WITHOUT DROWSINESS – Unlike other Calming Chews which mask anxiousness with a sedative that can cause drowsiness. +To The Rescue+ Calming Aid for dogs is a natural stress relief formula that keeps your pup alert while relieving any signs of anxiety and stress. Includes a FREE E- BOOK with DETAILED DOSAGE INSTRUCTIONS and tips for soothing your dog during times of stress and transition.

✅ EXPERIENCE THE DIFFERENCE A DAILY CALMING SUPPLEMENT CAN MAKE - Your dog is part of your family. We get that. Our Calming chews were formulated with love in Austin and made in the USA. If you don’t see the results you were hoping for, simply return the unused portion for a full refund. The rescue will get to keep the donated chews. We understand all dogs are unique and these chews might not be the right solution for every pet. Enjoy these chews 100% risk free!

✅ THESE CALMING TREATS HELP A SHELTER DOG FIND A HOME - For every bottle of Calming treats sold, we donate a weeks supply of calming treats to a dog rescue. These treats help promote relaxation and composure in dogs which eases the transition through the shelter system and ultimately into a new home. We could all use some GOOD KARMA....Feel good about your purchase and help a dog in need. It’s a win-win! Paw-it-forward!
